attributes.action: build an Oreo Cookie factory in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oreos are a really nice cookie, but it costs a lot to import them.

If a UK factory gets build, it would increase jobs, allow more tax to be given to the government from said sale of Oreos, and we the public would have easier access to Oreos too.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
